content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our ACCU-Beam® Variable Spot Size Handpieces include options for uvuloplasty, dermatology, gynecology, proctology, tissue incision, coagulation, and ablation. They are available with a range of focal lengths and tips for different procedures, and are compatible with most CO₂ lasers.

  • Available in configurations for a variety of procedures
  • Zoom optics to change the size and focus of the CO₂ beam
  • Compatible with most lasers by utilizing thread adapters
  • Built-in ports for positive and negative airflow
  • Sterilizable tips, including a backstop for uvuloplasty

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72517,72518,72519,72516″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574288236188{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Variable Spot Size Handpieces

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our ACCU-Beam® Variable Spot Size handpieces are a range of articulating arm CO₂ laser attachments for a variety of different procedures. Each handpiece features zoom optics to focus and de-focus the beam, and adjust the spot size of the handpiece. They come with a variety of tips for different procedures, all of which can be sterilized.

Like our other laser accessories the Variable Spot Size Handpieces can be used with almost any laser’s articulating arm by taking advantage of our laser thread adapters. If you purchase a new laser in the future this thread adapter can be changed to work with it.

Part # 6150 – Gynecology/Proctology handpiece
Part # 6200 – Dermatology handpiece
Part # 6200-2 – Zoom cutting handpiece
Part # 6201 – Uvuloplasty handpiece with backstop
Part # 6202 – Uvuloplasty handpiece without backstop[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54b367-debd”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with Sharplan, NIIC, LaserSonics, Merrimack, Illumina, Coherent, Intermedic, Lumenis, Zeiss, SWOT, Ellman/Sandstone, Union, Lasering, DEKA, Syneron, Bison, JH Laser and many other lasers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3db367-debd”][vc_column_text]Variable Spot Size Handpieces are class 2 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark. TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ab367-debd”][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
